name: hackathon-art-thief
description: Rewriting history using your skills of forgery

scripts.init: npm i concurrently && cd art-thief-ui && npm i && npm build && cd ../ai-gallery && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd art-thief-ui && npm run dev" "cd ai-gallery && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd art-thief-ui && node build/index.js" "cd ai-gallery && npm start"
